text: Pseudocentruropsis flavosignata is a species of beetles in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Pseudocentruropsis. It was described by Breuning in 1961.Biolib.cz - Pseudocentruropsis flavosignata. Retrieved September 8, 2014. The species have elongated body. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Monotypic Cerambycidae genera
title: Pseudocentruropsis
